content:
Iceland bar

The bar

Our restaurant serves everything from bistro to a la carte menu and our bar is well known for great selection of local beer.

Our hotel bar is more than just a hotel bar. Besides offering a wide selection of many of the best beers Iceland has to offer, it’s also a place where locals mix with people from all over the world. Wether it’s relaxing after a hard day sight-seeing or whatching a sports game on our big screens, you can be sure to enjoy yourself to the fullest.
